entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
